name: Portalshift
description:
Welcome to Portalshift!

This is a puzzle plattformer which I created for the 35th Ludumdare.

How to:

You are a small creepy creature called Steve.

Steve has abilities to change himself through the help of magical portals.

One form makes him agile, strong or even slimey...

Help him conquer all the stages which he - who knows why - wants to finish.

Each stage has up to 3 coins, collect more of them to unlock new stages.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys left, right and up or W, A and D to move/jump.

Have fun!
___________

Bugfix: Coin, Wallrun, Physics.
___________

Thanks for playing Portalshift!

I (Rakowu) created this game for the 35th Ludumdare game jam.

The theme was "Shapeshift" and it had to be completed in 48h by one person.

If you haven't already, please have a visit on Ludumdare.com and give me a good rating ;)

-> http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...

(There are tons of other cool games, so give them all a try!)
